mapper.select: /* get_main */ SELECT H.HOMEPAGE_NAME, H.CONNECT_TEL AS VIEW_TEL, REPLACE(H.CONNECT_TEL, '-', '') AS CONNECT_TEL, H.MAIN_IMG_PATH, H.TITLE1, H.USE_YN1, D1.IMG_PATH1 AS D1_IMG_PATH1, D1.IMG_PATH2 AS D1_IMG_PATH2, D1.IMG_PATH3 AS D1_IMG_PATH3, D1.IMG_PATH4 AS D1_IMG_PATH4, D1.IMG_PATH5 AS D1_IMG_PATH5, D1.IMG_PATH6 AS D1_IMG_PATH6, D1.IMG_PATH7 AS D1_IMG_PATH7, D1.IMG_PATH8 AS D1_IMG_PATH8, D1.IMG_PATH9 AS D1_IMG_PATH9, D1.IMG_PATH10 AS D1_IMG_PATH10, D1.MEMO1 AS D1_MEMO1, D1.MEMO2 AS D1_MEMO2, D1.MEMO3 AS D1_MEMO3, D1.MEMO4 AS D1_MEMO4, D1.MEMO5 AS D1_MEMO5, D1.MEMO6 AS D1_MEMO6, D1.MEMO7 AS D1_MEMO7, D1.MEMO8 AS D1_MEMO8, D1.MEMO9 AS D1_MEMO9, D1.MEMO10 AS D1_MEMO10, D1.USE_YN1 AS D1_USE_YN1, D1.USE_YN2 AS D1_USE_YN2, D1.USE_YN3 AS D1_USE_YN3, D1.USE_YN4 AS D1_USE_YN4, D1.USE_YN5 AS D1_USE_YN5, D1.USE_YN6 AS D1_USE_YN6, D1.USE_YN7 AS D1_USE_YN7, D1.USE_YN8 AS D1_USE_YN8, D1.USE_YN9 AS D1_USE_YN9, D1.USE_YN10 AS D1_USE_YN10, H.TITLE2, H.USE_YN2, D2.IMG_PATH1 AS D2_IMG_PATH1, D2.IMG_PATH2 AS D2_IMG_PATH2, D2.IMG_PATH3 AS D2_IMG_PATH3, D2.IMG_PATH4 AS D2_IMG_PATH4, D2.IMG_PATH5 AS D2_IMG_PATH5, D2.IMG_PATH6 AS D2_IMG_PATH6, D2.IMG_PATH7 AS D2_IMG_PATH7, D2.IMG_PATH8 AS D2_IMG_PATH8, D2.IMG_PATH9 AS D2_IMG_PATH9, D2.IMG_PATH10 AS D2_IMG_PATH10, D2.MEMO1 AS D2_MEMO1, D2.MEMO2 AS D2_MEMO2, D2.MEMO3 AS D2_MEMO3, D2.MEMO4 AS D2_MEMO4, D2.MEMO5 AS D2_MEMO5, D2.MEMO6 AS D2_MEMO6, D2.MEMO7 AS D2_MEMO7, D2.MEMO8 AS D2_MEMO8, D2.MEMO9 AS D2_MEMO9, D2.MEMO10 AS D2_MEMO10, D2.USE_YN1 AS D2_USE_YN1, D2.USE_YN2 AS D2_USE_YN2, D2.USE_YN3 AS D2_USE_YN3, D2.USE_YN4 AS D2_USE_YN4, D2.USE_YN5 AS D2_USE_YN5, D2.USE_YN6 AS D2_USE_YN6, D2.USE_YN7 AS D2_USE_YN7, D2.USE_YN8 AS D2_USE_YN8, D2.USE_YN9 AS D2_USE_YN9, D2.USE_YN10 AS D2_USE_YN10, H.TITLE3, H.USE_YN3, D3.IMG_PATH1 AS D3_IMG_PATH1, D3.IMG_PATH2 AS D3_IMG_PATH2, D3.IMG_PATH3 AS D3_IMG_PATH3, D3.IMG_PATH4 AS D3_IMG_PATH4, D3.IMG_PATH5 AS D3_IMG_PATH5, D3.IMG_PATH6 AS D3_IMG_PATH6, D3.IMG_PATH7 AS D3_IMG_PATH7, D3.IMG_PATH8 AS D3_IMG_PATH8, D3.IMG_PATH9 AS D3_IMG_PATH9, D3.IMG_PATH10 AS D3_IMG_PATH10, D3.MEMO1 AS D3_MEMO1, D3.MEMO2 AS D3_MEMO2, D3.MEMO3 AS D3_MEMO3, D3.MEMO4 AS D3_MEMO4, D3.MEMO5 AS D3_MEMO5, D3.MEMO6 AS D3_MEMO6, D3.MEMO7 AS D3_MEMO7, D3.MEMO8 AS D3_MEMO8, D3.MEMO9 AS D3_MEMO9, D3.MEMO10 AS D3_MEMO10, D3.USE_YN1 AS D3_USE_YN1, D3.USE_YN2 AS D3_USE_YN2, D3.USE_YN3 AS D3_USE_YN3, D3.USE_YN4 AS D3_USE_YN4, D3.USE_YN5 AS D3_USE_YN5, D3.USE_YN6 AS D3_USE_YN6, D3.USE_YN7 AS D3_USE_YN7, D3.USE_YN8 AS D3_USE_YN8, D3.USE_YN9 AS D3_USE_YN9, D3.USE_YN10 AS D3_USE_YN10, H.TITLE4, H.USE_YN4, D4.IMG_PATH1 AS D4_IMG_PATH1, D4.IMG_PATH2 AS D4_IMG_PATH2, D4.IMG_PATH3 AS D4_IMG_PATH3, D4.IMG_PATH4 AS D4_IMG_PATH4, D4.IMG_PATH5 AS D4_IMG_PATH5, D4.IMG_PATH6 AS D4_IMG_PATH6, D4.IMG_PATH7 AS D4_IMG_PATH7, D4.IMG_PATH8 AS D4_IMG_PATH8, D4.IMG_PATH9 AS D4_IMG_PATH9, D4.IMG_PATH10 AS D4_IMG_PATH10, D4.MEMO1 AS D4_MEMO1, D4.MEMO2 AS D4_MEMO2, D4.MEMO3 AS D4_MEMO3, D4.MEMO4 AS D4_MEMO4, D4.MEMO5 AS D4_MEMO5, D4.MEMO6 AS D4_MEMO6, D4.MEMO7 AS D4_MEMO7, D4.MEMO8 AS D4_MEMO8, D4.MEMO9 AS D4_MEMO9, D4.MEMO10 AS D4_MEMO10, D4.USE_YN1 AS D4_USE_YN1, D4.USE_YN2 AS D4_USE_YN2, D4.USE_YN3 AS D4_USE_YN3, D4.USE_YN4 AS D4_USE_YN4, D4.USE_YN5 AS D4_USE_YN5, D4.USE_YN6 AS D4_USE_YN6, D4.USE_YN7 AS D4_USE_YN7, D4.USE_YN8 AS D4_USE_YN8, D4.USE_YN9 AS D4_USE_YN9, D4.USE_YN10 AS D4_USE_YN10, H.TITLE5, H.USE_YN5, D5.IMG_PATH1 AS D5_IMG_PATH1, D5.IMG_PATH2 AS D5_IMG_PATH2, D5.IMG_PATH3 AS D5_IMG_PATH3, D5.IMG_PATH4 AS D5_IMG_PATH4, D5.IMG_PATH5 AS D5_IMG_PATH5, D5.IMG_PATH6 AS D5_IMG_PATH6, D5.IMG_PATH7 AS D5_IMG_PATH7, D5.IMG_PATH8 AS D5_IMG_PATH8, D5.IMG_PATH9 AS D5_IMG_PATH9, D5.IMG_PATH10 AS D5_IMG_PATH10, D5.MEMO1 AS D5_MEMO1, D5.MEMO2 AS D5_MEMO2, D5.MEMO3 AS D5_MEMO3, D5.MEMO4 AS D5_MEMO4, D5.MEMO5 AS D5_MEMO5, D5.MEMO6 AS D5_MEMO6, D5.MEMO7 AS D5_MEMO7, D5.MEMO8 AS D5_MEMO8, D5.MEMO9 AS D5_MEMO9, D5.MEMO10 AS D5_MEMO10, D5.USE_YN1 AS D5_USE_YN1, D5.USE_YN2 AS D5_USE_YN2, D5.USE_YN3 AS D5_USE_YN3, D5.USE_YN4 AS D5_USE_YN4, D5.USE_YN5 AS D5_USE_YN5, D5.USE_YN6 AS D5_USE_YN6, D5.USE_YN7 AS D5_USE_YN7, D5.USE_YN8 AS D5_USE_YN8, D5.USE_YN9 AS D5_USE_YN9, D5.USE_YN10 AS D5_USE_YN10 FROM HOMEPAGE_H H LEFT JOIN HOMEPAGE_D D1 ON H.IDX = D1.H_IDX AND D1.ORDER_NUM = 1 LEFT JOIN HOMEPAGE_D D2 ON H.IDX = D2.H_IDX AND D2.ORDER_NUM = 2 LEFT JOIN HOMEPAGE_D D3 ON H.IDX = D3.H_IDX AND D3.ORDER_NUM = 3 LEFT JOIN HOMEPAGE_D D4 ON H.IDX = D4.H_IDX AND D4.ORDER_NUM = 4 LEFT JOIN HOMEPAGE_D D5 ON H.IDX = D5.H_IDX AND D5.ORDER_NUM = 5 WHERE H.URL = #{url}
